item.title: Please help :( got some errors
item.dc:creator: @colten804 colten804
item.description:
@colten804 wrote:

First of all is this from the tutorial about adding spec to dragon claws? Secondly that means the variable has not been declared and that you need to declare them. Try looking on the topic, or board that you found this and there should be an example of declaring the Variables.
